page.title: 06HOUSING-VERY DESIRABLE AREA
page.content: The main village in our area,Bodle Street Green,is listed in the County Structure Plan as a village which can have no new houses unless replacements or infilling.So most of the houses are old-the bigger grander are yoeman farm houses of the 17 and 18 century,and the smaller ones are 18 or 19 century artisan's cottages-all endlessly extended over the years with porches, rooms and whole new wings.About six new dwellings have been built in the last 25 years. As a result,Bodle Street has become a very desirable area,and property is expensive.Yet despite the prices a most obvious change has taken place in the last few years-the houses are being bought by young couples with families and not by the newly retireds who have been coming here for so long.
